messages: [{"role": "provider", "content": "Ol\u00e1! Recebemos sua solicita\u00e7\u00e3o de negocia\u00e7\u00e3o. Vi que voc\u00ea \u00e9 cliente desde February de 2025. Qual desconto voc\u00ea gostaria de solicitar?", "timestamp": "2026-02-10T14:46:12.471734"}]

[{"role": "ai", "content": "Hello! I've analyzed your ChatGPT Plus subscription (Plus plan at R$ 100.00/month). Based on your February 2025 subscription start date, I believe we can negotiate a discount. I'm reaching out to ChatGPT Plus on your behalf to secure a potential saving of R$ 15.00/month. I'll keep you updated on their response.", "timestamp": "2026-02-10T16:26:11.499177"}]

[{"role": "ai", "content": "Hello! I've analyzed your Adobe Creative Cloud subscription (Plano B\u00e1sico plan at R$ 73.01/month).
